snippet: While many of the bodies recovered from the Titanic are buried in Canada, a cemetery in the Bronx became the final resting place for 12 “Titanic people.”
abstract: While many of the bodies recovered from the Titanic are buried in Canada, a cemetery in the Bronx became the final resting place for 12 “Titanic people.”

headline.main: Remembering Titanic: Where the Passengers Are Buried
headline.print_headline: In City’s Cemeteries, Reminders of the Titanic
